articles.author: AP
articles.title: Europe-Japan space mission views Mercury - PerthNow
articles.description: The BepiColombo space mission, run by Europe and Japan, has made the first of its six flybys of Mercury, using the planet's gravity to slow the spacecraft down.
articles.content:
A joint European-Japanese spacecraft has had its first glimpse of Mercury as it swung by the solar system's innermost planet while on a mission to deliver two probes into orbit in 2025.

articles.author: Liz Alderman
articles.title: As Bikers Throng the Streets, ‘It’s Like Paris Is in Anarchy’ - The New York Times
articles.description: An ecologically minded experiment to make Paris a cycling capital of Europe has led to a million people now pedaling daily — and to rising tensions with pedestrians.
articles.content: The abiding French sense of liberté is on display in the streets at all hours, where Parisians young and old jaywalk at nearly every opportunity. They appear to have carried that freewheeling spirit … [+1230 chars]
